phrases: You do not have a home.
You do not have a family.
You do not go to school.
You do not have any friends.
There is no place for you in this world.
The calm mind is the way.
We are not even in the rainy season yet.
It is a time like this and all I can do is comment on the weather.
Ayumu and Kyouko are worried about you.
We are having curry tonight, so come over!!
We will be waiting See you!
For: Hinata Kawamoto Re: To Kiriyama
However, I am feeling under the weather today, so I think I will stay h...
We are having curry, but we do not have any pickled vegetables!!
Could you please buy some at the convenience store on your way over?
Rei, did you get ice cream?
I bought ice cream, and pudding, too.
Oh my, you bought all this?
I will make room for the ice cream!
But I will pay you back for it.
Do not worry, it is a gift.
But sorry, I did not know which one to get, and ended up buying a lot.
How did your match go, Rei?
Akari said it was an important match for your club.
I have not had anything but water since yesterday!
Ah, not when I am holding the pot!
You are putting curry on the altar as an offering?
But, Mom and Grandma loved curry.
But they did really like it.
Well, I suppose it is correct.
Mom, Grandma, tonight's curry has pork in it!
Put egg on Momo's plate, too!
I wonder if you can finish a whole egg?
On the 16th in Hibiya City, police found the body of Shizuo Unagawa in his home
bludgeoned to death by a blunt instrument.
His eldest son Tadashi, a second-year university student,
who had been reported missing, was arrested.
According to the authorities, Tadashi is suspected of murdering
his father by beating him with a hammer dozens of times in the head.
It is unfortunate for Mr. Kouda.
His league entrance after all this time was riding on that.
And to think his own son would beat him so easily.
Although maybe he was satisfied after all.
Well, that is only if he was his real son.
It is so vivid, it is like I can still feel the warmth of the skin that I hit.
I will warm some up for you! - Uh, um...
You do not have to eat everything.
But you should eat a little.
Ate and nodded off, did he?
He laid down after he finished eating, as if he passed out.
But he was pale when he got here.
And he only ate a little bit.
I bet he could not get any sleep last night either.
Well, let him rest here for the night.
I will go back to the shop and sleep there.
Do not forget to lock up.
We will help you stuff the pancakes tomorrow.
In a small town by a big river
is where I will be living.
A magnificent white owl would not just show up at somebody is house.
And plus it is standing on the tatami mat floor...
You are a cat, are not you?
I am going to be late!
Well, I woke you up like I said I would.
- I am getting up now, do not worry.
Even though Sis woke me up...
I am going to be late!
Oh no, I do not have time.
You are going to have more?
It is a little big, but I pressed it together tightly, so it should be okay!
And this is a strange side dish as a whole, but it is good!
I have morning practice, so I have to go!
Please lock up when you leave!
W-Wait a second, if I have your key, you will not be able to get in.
Do not worry, we will find a way in somehow!
I guess I will try going...
That is a huge rice ball.
- Mr. Hayashida. - You are lucky to have rice.
I am broke until the end of the month, so this is all I can get.
So Kiriyama, do you guys get paid monthly for your matches?
Or do you get paid right after each match?
They make bank deposits at the end of the month for all matches played.
I have been following you online.
You have been on a winning streak, so you must have a lot of matches.
Let us see, the Kiryuu Tournament, the Jeweled General Tournament, the Rookie Tournament...
I do not want to think about it, but...
I am not going to eat lunch with you anymore!
Actually, I never asked you to...
If you do not like it, hurry up and make friends here at school!
I am an adult, so I am really busy!
Even though he became a professional during middle school and considered a genius,
here, he is just a 17-year-old with issues like anyone else.
I wonder what he is thinking about.
Can you help us with something?
I will tie the ribbons on, so could you put six in a box, and stack them?
That would be a great help.
Go ahead and wash your hands first.
Three each of egg bean paste and chunky bean paste.
Cute wrapping paper, is not it?
I carved up sweet potatoes and stamped them on.
They are for Grandpa's calligraphy teacher friend, who is celebrating his 70th birthday.
Who did this one, I wonder?
He taught Hina for a little while when she was in elementary school.
So this is her present to him.
I suspected it was you, Hina.
Someji is very fortunate to have grandchildren who are willing to help.
The little one tags along annoyingly, and she is so loud I cannot stand it.
Grandpa is a bit of a softie when it comes to his grandkids.
Well, I am off to deliver all this.
After that, I am staying for the party, so take care of everything else.
Rei, you will eat dinner with us tonight, right?
But I will be going home tonight.
I have another... another match, so I would better practice.
- Oh? - You have a lot of matches.
Also, thank you for the rice ball.
Just out of the oven, so it is really good.
Is this what you are looking for...
Kiriyama prefers cup noodles over the food Hina and I cook?
Do not put me off like that, Kiriyama!
We are friends, are not we?
March Comes in Like a Lion.
Do not miss the next episode.
